title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes.
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Thus, Douglas of Drumlanrig and Charterisof Amisfield did battle together in presence of the King, each having accused theother of high treason.

title: Miscellaneous Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott, Bart
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Most of the other abodes of the south-westernbarons, as Closeburn, Spedlin's Castle, Hoddom,Lagg, Amisfield, &c, are towers upon the sameplan with those already described.
